item.title: Journey Through `tyecon`: Predictions on Recipe Nutritions
item.description: Introduction #In this second part of the “journey through tyecon” series, I want to showcase the package’s facilities in simplifying tasks common to the predictive modelling part of data analysis.

item.title: Journey Through `tyecon`: Exploring Food.com Tags
item.description: Introduction #I’ve been working on my R package, tyecon for some time now.
